    • kegg-graph

Transform a ggkegg graph to igraph or visNetwork

Source: R/ggkegg_to_visnetwork.R
kegg_to_graph.Rd

Transform a ggkegg graph to igraph or visNetwork

Usage

kegg_to_graph(
  path_id,
  organism = "mmu",
  de_results = NULL,
  return_type = "igraph",
  scaling_factor = 2.5
)

Arguments

path_id

KEGG pathway ID (e.g., "hsa:04110" or "04110").

organism

KEGG organism code (e.g., "hsa" for human, "mmu" for mouse).

de_results

Named list of differential expression results. Each entry should be a list with elements: de_table (data.frame), value_column (character), feature_column (character), threshold (numeric).

return_type

Output type: "igraph" or "visNetwork".

scaling_factor

Numeric factor to scale node sizes.

Value

An igraph or visNetwork object representing the pathway.
